channel.title: About on Danjela Lura
channel.description: Recent content in About on Danjela Lura

item.title: About me
item.description: This is Danjela! I am a computer science major based in Greece, and this blog/portfolio is my go-to place to share my views, ideas, and experiences with the world! I am momentarily focused on initiatives that improve diversity and inclusion within the local tech communities I belong to. I have just started an R-Ladies chapter in the city of Thessaloniki, and I am working on officially kick starting the chapter by hosting a workshop related to functional programming (which I love) in R.
